alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:11PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Churchill County through 545 PM PDT... At 511 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Fallon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Fallon Station and Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd). MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
